summary: Diff implements the new Client field shape across backend types and frontend UI, adds a Motoko migration mapping legacy client.contactInfo into notes, adds frontend bulk upload (CSV) utilities + dialog, and adds React Query hooks for bulk create/delete. However, the diff summary does not provide direct evidence that backend CRUD read/update functions and the new bulk client APIs are actually implemented/exposed in backend/main.mo (only the new Client type and createClient are shown before truncation).

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend CRUD APIs (updateClient, getClient, getAllClients) must accept/return the new Client shape (name, gstin?, pan?, notes?)
missing_requirements.reason: backend/main.mo diff snippet shows the updated Client type and createClient using the new fields, but the provided truncated excerpt does not show updateClient/getClient/getAllClients implementations returning/accepting the new shape.
evidence: backend/main.mo (truncated excerpt only shows Client type + createClient)

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend must expose bulkCreateClients (list input -> created ClientIds) and bulkDeleteClients (list of ClientIds) with proper auth checks
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend hooks call actor.bulkCreateClients and actor.bulkDeleteClients, but the diff summary does not show these methods being added to backend/main.mo (file is truncated before any bulk client API definitions).
evidence: backend/main.mo (truncated; no bulk client APIs shown)
